item.title: Why I love reStructuredText
item.description: A lot of geeks are using Markdown as their markup generation tool today. It’s simple, effective and used everywhere. It allows you to focus on your content and not on the HTML code that will be used to display the content on a web page. I have used Markdown extensively and its simplicity is appealing to me. reStructuredText is similar to Markdown. If you know Markdown, it’s dead simple to learn to use RST.
